entry.dcterms:title: MKI Economy 1989-3. Hungarian popular opinion about the economic situation of Hungary and the political power.
entry.dcterms:creator: Merkl, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-C52: MKI Economy 1989-3. Hungarian popular opinion about the economic situation of Hungary and the political power.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: Bokor, Ágnes
entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-03-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: panel survey in 1989; economic difficulties in Hungary, relationship between citizens and those in power; interest in and opinions about economic and political changes in Hungary; economic and social problems in western countries and societies under communism
